vk.vk module¶

A part of library which represent a main object of VK API.

class vk.vk.VK(access_token: str, *, loop: asyncio.events.AbstractEventLoop = None, client: aiohttp.client.ClientSession = None)¶

Bases: vk.utils.mixins.ContextInstanceMixin

The main object of VKAPI, have basically methods to access in API.

async api_request(method_name: str, params: dict = None, ignore_errors: bool = False) → dict¶

Send api request to VK server :param method_name: method to execute :param params: parameters of method :param ignore_errors: signal of errors ignore :return:

async close() → None¶

Close aiohttp client session. :return:

async execute_api_request(code: str) → dict¶

https://vk.com/dev/execute

Parameters

code – code for execute. Example: return API.status.get();

Returns

get_api() → vk.methods.api.API¶

Get API class :return:

vk.py
